title: POLI 404A Public Policy and Its Administration - PUBLIC POLICY
description: Political and administrative aspects of public policy, particularly in Canada.
prerequisites: POLI 101 and one of POLI 301, POLI 302, POLI 303, POLI 304, POLI 305, POLI 306, POLI 307, POLI 308, POLI 350, POLI 351, POLI 352.
